dtliExcerpt: Kit Connor and Rachel Zegler are both magnetic performers, but this Broadway revival feels more like a concert than a cohesive theatrical experience.
showScoreExcerpt: Kit Connor and Rachel Zegler are both magnetic performers, but this Broadway revival feels more like a concert than a cohesive theatrical experience.
nycTheatreExcerpt: "One could be forgiven for walking away from this show's two (and a half) hours' traffic thinking that maybe Romeo and Juliet is kind of mid after all. Such is the enervating effect of so aggressively clickbaity and uncurious a production."
